knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
# Import package
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
# Check invalid lines for head and tail
all_lines <- readLines("lang_raw_2021.csv")
length(all_lines) 
head(all_lines, 11)
tail(all_lines, 9)
```

```{r}
# Remove invalid lines
clean_lines <- all_lines[10:(length(all_lines) - 9)]

# define temporary file name
temp_file <- "lang_temp_2021.csv"

# Save temporary file for document
writeLines(clean_lines, temp_file)

# read temporary file
lang_2021 <- read_csv(temp_file)

# Display data frame
head(lang_2021)
```

```{r}
# Remove NA column
lang_2021 <- lang_2021 %>% select(where(~ !all(is.na(.))))

# Remove 'Total' column
lang_2021 <- lang_2021 %>% select(-Total)

# Remove 'SA2 (UR)' row
lang_2021 <- lang_2021 %>% filter(.[[1]] != "SA2 (UR)")

# Rename sa2 
lang_2021 <- lang_2021 %>% rename(sa2 = '2-digit level LANP Language Used at Home')

# Check data frame
head(lang_2021)

```
